tool_description: The Map Geocoding API is a powerful tool that translates addresses and place names into geographical coordinates (latitude and longitude), allowing developers to seamlessly integrate location-based services into their applications. By converting human-readable location information into precise geographic data, this API enables accurate mapping, navigation, and location-based features that enhance user experiences across various platforms.
name: Map Geocoding
title: Map Geocoding

api_list.name: Get Data By Latitude and Longitude
api_list.description: Get Data By Latitude and Longitude

api_list.name: Get Data By Place ID
Get Data By Address

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.default: 25 Murray Street, New York, NY 10007, Amerika Serikat
